summary: Re-upload of the old Infinite Ore mod, now with NMM compatibility.
descriptionHtml:
SPECIAL EDITION VERSION UPLOADED - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2320/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2320/?[/url]

Original Mod found here - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8505/

This is the Infinite Ore Veins mod that has been re-packaged to work with NMM for those who like to use NMM for everything.

Credits:
thserpa - Original Mod Author
author: Rocopherus
